allow: Bash("/c/Program Files/GitHub CLI/gh.exe" auth login --web --git-protocol https)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Production infrastructure and v357 protocol implementation

- Replace wsgiref with waitress for multi-threaded HTTP handling
- Implement v357 binary protocol for efficient mount communication
- Add cache integration to Alpaca API responders with per-property staleness
- Add command priority queue to prevent cache thread blocking user operations
- Fix ASCOM V4 compliance for deprecated sync slew methods
- Add testing infrastructure with pytest fixtures and unit tests
- Add CLAUDE.md project documentation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement Phase 9: GUI strategy and headless mode support

- Add CLI argument parsing for operating modes \(--headless, --gui-available\)
- Add GUI configuration section to config.toml \(theme, refresh interval, bind address\)
- Add GUI config properties to Config class with defaults
- Update TelescopeInterface to accept theme, bind_address, refresh_interval params
- Apply dark/light theme support via NiceGUI dark_mode\(\)
- Use configurable refresh intervals instead of hardcoded values
- Pass bind address to NiceGUI ui.run\(\) for proper network binding
- Fix socket.close\(\) bugs \(missing parentheses\) in telescope_data.py
- Fix bare except clause and variable scope issue in telescope_gui.py
- Add comprehensive GUI configuration tests \(18 new test cases\)
- Update CLAUDE.md with operating modes, CLI arguments, and test documentation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
